document_data.name: Punkins
document_data.mainbody:
'''Punkins''' was a child from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Don't move, Cinnamon! Now, uh, inspection protocol initiated. Hand over that candy!''|Punkins}}
document_data.Description: Punkins was a [[human]] boy with pale skin skin and blue eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Punkins spent his days playing with fellow children of the Gate, [[Cinnamon (child)|Cinnamon]] and [[Slow-Butt]]. The kids played [[steel watcher]]s and the spies of the [[Absolute]]. Punkins was assigned the steel watcher's role who was to find the spies and find smuggled [[candy]] in the children's pockets. In his role, Punkins loved snitches.
